desolation sounds




Desolation Sounds is a sound collective and studio space based in Vancouver, British Columbia. We provide artists with the tools necesary to push their boundaries musicaly, whether it be through mixdowns, mastering or sound design.

Desolation Sounds is created by Joel Barrette a Producer/DJ in Vancouver BC
